top of page Have You Tried These Daily Specials? RESTAURANT WEEK 2026 January 8- 18 Get ready for a flavor-filled adventure. Enjoy Restaurant Week at Famulari's from Thursday, January 8 to Sunday, January 18, 2026. Indulge in our special Dinner For Two menu for only $30. click to view menu ​ (Available for dine-in only at Cainhoy, Cane Bay, and Hanahan)​ SundayS Half Off All Appetizers (all day • dine-in only at Cainhoy, Cane Bay and Hanahan) ​ ​​ ​ ​ Tuesdays 10" One-Topping Pizzas $6 ​ (all day • dine-in & carryout at Cainhoy, Cane Bay, Hanahan, Oakbrook, & West Ashley​ dine-in only at Fam's Brewing Co.) ​ $5 Margaritas (4-7PM at Cainhoy, Cane Bay, and Hanahan) Fam's Brewing Co. Deals Click here to see the daily specials at our brewery on James Island ​ ​ Fam's Test Kitchen January - March 2026 The Boss, a chicken parmesan pizza with marinara, mozzarella, chicken tenders, fresh mozz, parmesan, and basil, is our first Test Kitchen feature pizza, available January through March. A new Test Kitchen pizza will roll out once every quarter, so try them while they’re here. MONDAYS One free order of breadsticks with any delivery order all day, every Monday at Famulari's: Hanahan, Oakbrook, and West Ashley Wednesdays ​ 1/2 Price Wine Bottles ​ (Available 4-7PM for dine-in at Cainhoy, Cane Bay and Hanahan) ​ ​ Happy Hour Monday-Friday 4-7pm $5 FBC Drafts (under 7% abv) & Glasses of Wine $4 House Liquor Drinks (Available for dine-in only at Cainhoy, Cane Bay, and Hanahan)​ MONDAYS Classic BYO Burger for $6.99 *includes a burger, bun, cheese, and fries. additional toppings extra. (all day • available for dine-in only at Cainhoy, Cane Bay, and Hanahan, and for dine-in, carryout, and delivery at Oakbrook and West Ashley)​ ​ ​​ ​ ​ $5 Moscow Mules (4-7PM at Cainhoy, Cane Bay and Hanahan) Saturdays 14 inch One-Topping Pizza for $10 (all day • available for dine-in only at Cainhoy, Cane Bay, and Hanahan, and for dine-in, carryout, and delivery at Oakbrook and West Ashley)​ bottom of page

top of page Famulari's Pizzeria: Hanahan Wine Menu Red Wine Cabernet: Peirano Estate, CA $9 / $36 Bold, dark raspberry notes, well balanced & smooth Chianti: Barbanera, Italy $7 / $28 Hints of berries & spiced violet, dry finish Malbec: MDZ, Argentina $8 / $32 Fruity nose, low tannins, hints of cocoa & berries Merlot: Broadside, CA $10 / $40 Cherry & vanilla aroma, dry fruit palate, high acidity Petite Sirah: Peirano Estates, CA $9 / $36 Rich, generous oak note flush with red berries, mild spicy finish Pinot Noir: Fable, CA $10 / $40 Generous plum & strawberry nose; soft, mild finish White Wine Chardonnay: Spoken West, CA 8 / 32 Tropical fruit coupled with a backbone of vanilla and oak Pinot Grigio: Mirabello, Italy $7 / $28 Fleshy melon & subtle lime notes, fresh & light bodied Riesling: Single Post, Germany $10 / $40 Subtle peach & plum notes with balanced light acidity Rose: Domaine Vetriccie, France $8 / $32 Pale pink, crisp fruity nose, slight minerality Sauvignon Blanc: Prisma, Chile $9 / $36 Light notes of lemon, crisp minerality, balanced finish Sparkling Wine Cava: Los Monteros, Spain $7 / $28 Clean & crisp, bright citrus notes bottom of page

James Island View Menu 11am - 10pm Mon - Sun ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ 1291 Folly Rd Charleston, SC 29412 843-225-4646 brewpub@famspizza.com ​ ​ JOIN OUR TEAM Oakbrook Summerville View Menu JOIN OUR TEAM Sun-Thu 11am - 10pm Fri - Sat 11am - 11pm ​ ​ ​ 1704 Old Trolley Rd Summerville, SC 29485 843-832-2222 oakbrook@famspizza.com ​ ​ Cainhoy Clements Ferry Rd View Menu Sun-Thurs 11am - 10pm - 11am - 11pm Fri Sat ​ ​ ​ 1721 Clements Ferry Road Charleston, SC 29492 843-972-8001 cainhoy@famspizza.com ​ ​ JOIN OUR TEAM West Ashley Charleston View Menu 11am - 10pm Sun-Thur - 11am - 11pm Fri Sat ​ ​ 2408 Ashley River Rd Charleston, SC 29414 843-571-0555 westashley@famspizza.com ​ ​ JOIN OUR TEAM Hanahan Hanahan Crossing View Menu Sun-Thur 11am - 10pm Fri - Sat 11am - 11pm ​ ​ ​ ​ 1000 Tanner Ford Blvd Hanahan, SC 29410 843-572-7105 hanahan@famspizza.com ​ ​ ​ JOIN OUR TEAM LOCATIONS & MENU Our Pizza New York STYLE The perfectly foldable slice of ‘za, our New York Style is a classic. Imagine crispy crust and a warm, doughy middle layered with toppings we prepare in-house. The mozzarella is freshly-grated, the toppings are sliced just for you, and our hand-tossed dough is made in-house. Baked to the ideal crisp inside our brick deck oven, this is the quintessential pizza experience. Choose a specialty pie like the popular BBQ chicken or build your own 10, 14, or 18-inch—fold a slice and enjoy. Chicago STYLE Two inches thick and five pounds heavy, our Chicago Style pizza is a true deep dish. As the only pizzeria in Charleston that makes Chicago style, we pride ourselves on making it perfectly with our in-house dough, freshly-sliced toppings and special Chicago-style pans. We bake fresh mozzarella and toppings between two layers of light and fluffy dough, finishing it with a buttered crust, a layer of chunky tomato sauce and a sprinkle of parmesan on top. Go classic or try our Cheese Steak creation and cut in—this is not a pizza to be taken lightly. (If you’re up for it, check out our Chicago Challenge: one person, one topping, one hour.) Our Story Famulari’s Pizzeria was born from strong friendship, brotherhood, and a passion for pizza. In 2003, brothers Jason and Justin Famulari teamed up with longtime friends Josh and Brandon. With their 20+ years of pizza-making experience, they set out to create the best possible pizza. After five years of careful planning, the first Famulari’s Pizza launched in Summerville, South Carolina in 2008. We've been voted nearly every year since (Winner 2009-2015 & 2017-2024). BEST PIZZA In 2024, Famulari’s celebrated opening its 6th location when they opened their doors in Cane Bay. Now you can enjoy the famous pizzas all over the Charleston metro. As City Paper put it: “If you have to have pizza, and if you care what it tastes like, you should be at Famulari's.” bottom of page
